specific_issues.description:
Support reforms to the Personnel Surety Program (PSP) / background check issue.
Support efforts to increase cyber security in order to safeguard America's critical infrastructure. Support for S. 754, the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act (CISA) of 2015 and H.R. 1560, the Protecting Cyber Networks Act (PCNA), and H.R. 1731, the National Cybersecurity Protection Advancement Act (NCPAA) of 2015.
Support fixes to the Ammonium Nitrate Security Program.
Member of the Chemical Sector Coordinating Council (CSCC).
Support HR 2576, the TSCA Modernization Act of 2015
Support S 697, Frank R. Lautenberg Chemical Safety for the 21st Century Act

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, White House Office, Agriculture - Dept of (USDA), Homeland Security - Dept of (DHS)

specific_issues.description:
Support reforms to the Personnel Surety Program (PSP) / background check issue.
Support efforts to increase cyber security in order to safeguard America's critical infrastructure. Support for S. 754, the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act (CISA) of 2015 and H.R. 1560, the Protecting Cyber Networks Act (PCNA), and H.R. 1731, the National Cybersecurity Protection Advancement Act (NCPAA) of 2015.
Support fixes to the Ammonium Nitrate Security Program.
Member of the Chemical Sector Coordinating Council (CSCC).

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Agriculture - Dept of (USDA), White House Office, Transportation - Dept of (DOT), Small Business Adminstration (SBA)

specific_issues.description:
Work to ensure competitive corporate and individual tax rates through broad based tax reforms.
Support accelerating depreciation schedule for agricultural equipment used by agricultural operations over a five year period.
Support HR 1317, S. 876 - CTU Bill
Support HR 1108, Death Tax Repeal
Support HR 863 / S. 1809, STARS Act

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Agriculture - Dept of (USDA), Internal Revenue Service (IRS), Homeland Security - Dept of (DHS), White House Office

specific_issues.description:
Co-Chair Coalition for Precision Agriculture.
Work with USDA-NRCS on certainty guidelines.
Member of the Rural Broadband Coalition
Member of the Coalition for Safe and Affordable Food.
Support continued funding for crop insurance as a needed safety net for farmers.
Support TSP and EQIP reforms - direct contracting between USDA-NRCS and third party TSPs; and prevailing local market rates for TSPs.
Work with Modern Ag Caucus to promote industry stewardship efforts and use of precision ag technologies.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Agriculture - Dept of (USDA), Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Transportation - Dept of (DOT), White House Office

specific_issues.description:
Member of Coalition of Derivatives End-Users.
Support 25 x 25 Ag Energy Coalition efforts to promote the production and use of renewable fuels.
Supports Renewable Fuels Standards (RFS)
Supports policies that promote the use of flex fuel vehicles and E85 fueling stations.
Supports increase domestic exploration and production of natural gas and oil and oppose efforts to limit production as it hurts domestic manufacture of fertilizer and ag chemicals.

ali_info.federal_agencies: Agriculture - Dept of (USDA), Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

specific_issues.description:
Support HR 897, Reducing Regulatory Burdens Act of 2015. Support S. 1500, the Sensible Environmental Protection Act of 2015.
Support elimination of the fertilizer reporting exemption for ag retailers under the EPA's Emergency Planning and Community Right to Know Act reporting requirements.
Oppose EPA and Army Corps of Engineers effort to expand the Clean Water Act, including the Section 404 Interpretative Rule.
Work with EPA regarding its review of the Risk Management Program as part of Executive Order 13650.
Member of the EPA's Pesticide Policy Dialogue Committee (PPDC).
Supports the Regulatory Integrity Protection Act (HR 1732).
Support for Federal Water Quality Protection Act (S. 1140).
Supports reforms to the EPA's emergency response programs that promotes increase coordination between local emergency planning committees (LEPCs), first responders, and the private sector.
Support the General Duty Clarification Act.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Agriculture - Dept of (USDA), White House Office, Small Business Adminstration (SBA)

specific_issues.description:
Support the Surface Transportation Board Reauthorization Act of 2015 (S. 808).
Support Hazmat Safety Permit reform language for inclusion in the FY 2016 THUD Appropriations Bill.
Supports Hazmat Reauthorization legislation.
Oppose the Vehicle Miles Traveled (VMT) tax as a way to fund the federal highway system.
Support increased truck weights legislation - Safe and Efficient Transportation Act (SETA)
Support reforming federal age requirement (lower age from 21 to 18) for short haul drivers to operate a commercial motor vehicle in interstate commerce.
Support HR 3651, the Positive Train Control Enforcement and Implementation Act of 2015, to extend the December 31, 2015 deadline until December 31, 2018.
Support S. 654 / HR 1267, legislation to exempt certain class A CDL drivers from the requirement to obtain a hazardous materials endorsement while operating a service vehicle with a fuel tank containing 1,000 gallons or less.
Support permanent removal of 30 minute rest break after eight hours of service requirement for livestock and poultry industry.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Agriculture - Dept of (USDA), Small Business Adminstration (SBA), Surface Transportation Board (STB)

specific_issues.description:
Work with OSHA on updating and revising 1910.109 (i) Ammonium Nitrate storage regulations.
Oppose OSHA Process Safety Management (PSM) retail exemption guidance revision.
Work with OSHA and EPA on new Fertilizer Safety and Health Partners (FSHP) Alliance Program.
Work with OSHA on new Hazard Communication Standards regulations as it relates to custom blended products.
Oppose DOL's Hour & Wage Divisions EAP Overtime Rules
Support HR 4773 / S 2707, the Protecting Workplace Advancement and Opportunity Act.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Labor - Dept of (DOL), Occupational Safety & Health Administration (OSHA)

specific_issues.description:
Oppose the Legal Workforce Act (HR 1147) as it does not address necessary reforms to the agricultural guest work programs.
Support comprehensive immigration reform that includes a workable Ag Guest Worker Program.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Homeland Security - Dept of (DHS), Labor - Dept of (DOL), Agriculture - Dept of (USDA)

specific_issues.description: Support reform of the Endangered Species Act (ESA)

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

specific_issues.description:
Support existing funding for Farm Bill programs.
Support riders in FY 2016 Interior and Labor Appropriations bills related to EPA RMP and OSHA PSM regulations regarding ammonium nitrate fertilizer and OSHA PSM retail exemption guidance revision.
Support new NAICS section for Farm Supply Retailers

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

specific_issues.description:
Support Trade Promotion Authority (HR 1314)
Support Free Trade agreements.
Support Ports Act (S. 519).
Support Trans Pacific Partnership

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, U.S. Trade Representative (USTR)

specific_issues.description:
Supports the Safe & Accurate Food Labeling Act of 2015 (HR 1599).
Supports federal solution to biotech food labeling issue.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

specific_issues.description:
Support HR 2631 / S 1487, the Regulatory Predictability for Business Growth Act of 2015
Support HR 3438, Require Evaluation before Implementing Executive Wish Lists Act of 2015
Support S 1807, Regulatory Impact Scale on the Economy Small Business Acr of 2015 (RISE Small Business Act of 2015)
Support S 378 / HR 712 the Sunshine for Regulatory Decrees and Settlements Act of 2015.
